original_title: Pink Floyd Songs: An All-Star Lineup
overview: Steve Luthaker, Ted Nugent, Mike Porcaro, Robben Ford, Chris Squire, Tommy Shaw and other rock 'n' roll heavyweights pay tribute to Pink Floyd by playing the band's greatest hits. Tracks include "Shine on You Crazy Diamond," "Money," "Comfortably Numb," "Welcome to the Machine," "Have a Cigar," "Us and Them," "Run Like Hell," "Any Colour You Like," "Breathe (In the Air)" and more. An essential for Pink Floyd fans.
title: Pink Floyd Songs: An All-Star Lineup
